title: Cursor Inaccurate (Resolution?)
body: I use a large TV for a monitor, so I need to mess around with the computer's overall resolution for about a half hour before everything looks even decent, but then it crumbles in League. When I FINALLY find a resolution that works in fullscreen, the cursor clicks an inch or two to the right of where the cursor is actually displayed, making the actual playing of the game impossible. How do I fix this?

replies.body: League doesn't always play well with really uncommon resolutions that some TV's seem to use, so you may need to try using a more common 16:9 aspect ratio display resolution in order to get the cursor to work properly. Do you happen to know what resolution you're currently running and which ones are available to select inside your [**windows settings**](http://www.thewindowsclub.com/change-screen-resolution-windows-10-2)?
